document_data.caption: A map of Gnarhelm showing Otta in the west.
document_data.name: Otta
document_data.mainbody: '''Otta''' was a small village located in the kingdom of [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Otta was located in western Gnarhelm near the coast of the [[Sea of Moonshae]]. The village sat upon the northern shore of [[Lake Otta]] in the leeward shadow of [[Hardangheight]].
